purpose: Replaces the basename (the name of the file without its extension) with a randomly generated alphanumeric string 7 characters long

args.name: folder
args.description: The folder whose contents will have scrambled basenames after the execution of this script

args.name: force
args.description: Skip the prompt asking the user to confirm their actions

args.name: quiet
args.description: Suppresses output showing the new and old file names

exit_codes.1: The given directory does not exist
